message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"hot (having a high temperature)","sentence":"水很热。","image_prompt":"A steaming cup of water sits on a simple table. The cup has heat waves rising visibly from it, as if it is very hot. The background is soft and slightly apocalyptic, with gentle pastel colors and faint signs of an otherworldly, post-apocalyptic world. The setting is calm, and the focus is on the hot cup of water and the visible steam, all in a soft apocalypse animation style.","sentence_translation":"The water is hot."}
